title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
**Introducing the Ultimate Travel Power Adapter for Your Global Adventures!**

Are you tired of dealing with pesky adapter issues while traveling abroad? Look no further! Our [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter is here to revolutionize your travel experience. With its compact design, dual USB ports, and safe grounded 3-prong plug, this adapter is perfect for charging all your devices on-the-go.

**Key Features:**

* Compact and lightweight design (2.8 x 2.6 x 2.3 in) makes it easy to carry
* Dual USB ports charge up to 2.4A, perfect for multiple devices at once
* 2 American outlets provide power for your laptop, camera, or other devices
* Compatible with countries: Italy, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Libya, San Marino, Syria, Uruguay, Vatican City
* Grounded 3-prong plug ensures safe and secure connection
* Wide voltage compatibility (100V-250V) supports low-power electronics

**Why Choose Our Adapter?**

* CE and FCC certified for quality assurance
* 12-month warranty and friendly customer service
* NOT a converter - devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage if not for low-power electronics
* Ideal for cell phones, tablets, power banks, and other electric products

**Order Your [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter Today!**

Don't let adapter issues ruin your travel experience. With our [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, you'll be able to charge all your devices with ease and confidence. Order now and get ready for a stress-free adventure!
